Module chessmine
Package abcpackage

Class Board

java.lang.Object
abcpackage.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Board class to set and print the Board of the chess game
Author:
Daniel Rogozenski

    • getElement

      public Position getElement​(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - for the x coordinate of a certain square on the board
      y - for the y coordinate of a certain square on the board
      Returns:
      the position of the piece on the board, respective to the piece

    • check

      public boolean check()
      grabbing the position of the kings for both sides
      Returns:
      true if in check and false if otherwise

    • checkMate

      public boolean checkMate​(boolean turn)
      Checks if a player is in checkmate
      Parameters:
      turn - The color to check for checkmate (w or b): white = true, black = false
      Returns:
      True if player is in checkmate, false otherwise

    • check

      public boolean check​(Move move, java.lang.String turn)
      checks if a move will result in a player putting themselves in check, inorder to see if its invalid
      Parameters:
      move - move to check the result
      turn - the string color of whos turn it is
      Returns:
      true if in check and false if otherwise

    • performMove

      public void performMove​(Move m)
      performMove to move the actual pieces to their respective places
      Parameters:
      m - the move to perform no return type and parameter m of Move

    • over

      public boolean over()
      over() to check the game status
      Returns:
      false if else, true if game over

      public boolean winner()
